actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions by multicandidate political committees and to limit contributions in House of Representatives elections from persons other than individual in-State residents.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to: (1) prohibit Federal election contributions by multicandidate political committees; and (2) limit House of Representatives election contributions, from persons other than individual in-State residents, to not more than 20 percent of total contributions.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions by multicandidate political committees and to limit contributions in House of Representatives elections from persons other than individual in-State residents.
